name: AbyssalKart
description:
If you, or anyone in your family, have an epileptic condition, consult your
physician before playing. If you experience any of the following symptoms while playing a video or computer game - dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awarness. disorientation, involuntary movement or convulsions: Immediatly discontinue playing and consult your physician before resuming.

In this race game you play as one of the elder beings and race against the time and/or each other. The longer you live your score rises but the corruption will also increase. The corruption brings with it: Hazards that will try to stop you as you continue to try and get a higher score.

  • Local Multiplayer
  • Multiple Hazards
  • 2 Playable Characters
  • Timer/Score
  • FOSS license! https://github.com/Hertog-lab/-AbyssalKart
